summary: Skyrim\'s OG look with a bit more color and sharpening
descriptionHtml:
[COLOR=\"Red\"]UPDATED[/COLOR] to 1.1 - see changes in log or below

This has the same look as vanilla Skyrim with a bit extra color, not very much, just enough to be noticeable. Also some extra sharpening to give the textures a more HD look but without over doing it.

(with my firefox settings, i middle click the images above to see them full size in a new tab - you can see the changes much better that way)

This uses FXAA Post Process Injector by some_dude (http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=131) and has tweaks to injFX_Settings.h by me. This is using some-dude\'s latest version at time of upload. There are different versions out there which can cause a crash if you\'re trying multiple tweaks, so I included the version that this was made for.

[COLOR=\"orange\"]INCLUDED:[/COLOR]
FXAA Post Process Injector by some_dude
- [COLOR=\"navy\"]injFX_Shaders[/COLOR] - folder
- [COLOR=\"navy\"]d3d9.dll[/COLOR] - file
- [COLOR=\"navy\"]injFX_Settings.h[/COLOR] - file tweaked by me
- [COLOR=\"navy\"]log.log[/COLOR] - file
- [COLOR=\"navy\"]shader.fx[/COLOR] - file

- [COLOR=\"black\"]Z - Remove Injector Files.bat[/COLOR] - file created by me to easily remove injector files (it does not remove itself though)


[COLOR=\"orange\"]DOWNLOAD:[/COLOR]
you only need to download version 1.1 [COLOR=\"darkorange\"]OR[/COLOR] version 1.0 if you want a bit more sharpening


[COLOR=\"orange\"]INSTALL:[/COLOR]
extract folder directly into the Skyrim base directory (see screenshot for example)

that\'s it to make it work!


[COLOR=\"orange\"]SETTINGS:[/COLOR]
- I use AAx2 with the FXAA turned OFF in the launcher options. (see screenshot for example)
- while in game, press the \"Pause/Break\" key to turn on and off the effect to see the difference.


[COLOR=\"orange\"]UNINSTALL:[/COLOR]
2 methods:
- just run the included \"Z - Remove Injector Files.bat\" found in your skyrim base directory to remove all the injector files. (see screenshot for reference)
- manually delete \"Z - Remove Injector Files.bat\" or leave it if you plan to use/remove other injector files.
[COLOR=\"darkorange\"]OR[/COLOR]
- manually remove the files shown in green found in the above section \"[COLOR=\"orange\"]INCLUDED:[/COLOR]\"



[COLOR=\"orange\"]VERSION:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=\"red\"]1.0[/COLOR] - First uploaded version. Screenshots are from this version
- This version is sharper than 1.1

[COLOR=\"red\"]1.1[/COLOR] - Version that I am using now
- Change Log
-- removed the post sharpen effect as it was negligible
-- tweaked the sharpening amount down one notch providing a sharp but smooth image more to my taste.
author: jellinn
